name: soho
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
abbreviation for small office/home office: a small office, especially one in someone's home. The expression is used especially when referring to the sale of computer equipment and software to this type of office: Efficient communications are essential for the SOHO market. a SOHO firm/enterpriseSOHO system/equipment This SOHO system is fast enough for most office tasks.
